An adamant hasta is a one handed melee weapon similar in both size and shape to a spear. It requires 30 Attack and Barbarian Training in Smithing to wield. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a shield provides more defence than a normal spear. They can also be poisoned.

Poison++Karambwan poison

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)

The hasta's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

10 December 2014
(update)

The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Addy hasta(p++)" to "Adamant hasta(p++)".

An '''adamant hasta''' is a one handed [[melee]] [[weapon]] similar in both size and shape to a [[spear]]. It requires 30 [[Attack]] and [[Barbarian Training]] in [[Smithing]] to wield. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a [[shield]] provides more defence than a normal spear. They can also be [[poison]]ed.
